TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sirakesay, title = Sirakesay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sirakesay} }

S.FORM: Sirakesay Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hualien ko Sirakesay a niyaro', 1,845 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 4,720 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 10% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 486 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 90% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4,234 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis8%, Truku1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.

Sirakesay Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hoalien ko Sirakesay a niyaro', 1,845 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 4,720 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 10% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 486 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 90% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4,234 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis8%, Troko1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.
